message:
SYSTEM: EVERIS_Monnet%28ele-v1%29.pdf: Página 2
2
<<EVERIS, January 12th, 2010>>
Main Objective
• The Monnet project will provide a semantics-based 
solution for integrated information access across 
language barriers. 
• A key solution to this problem is to deal with information 
at the semantic level, allowing for more advanced and 
uniform: 
• i) integration, 
• ii) aggregation, 
 
• iii) querying, and 
• iv) presentation of information across languages
speaker: SYSTEM
